description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Blackjack is the most popular casino game in the world! Now take your avatar into the exciting game of chance and skill. Play over Xbox LIVE and showcase your avatar as well as your stuff. Earn 12 in-game awards that unlock content to customize your game room. Whether you hit, stand, or double down, this game always feels like a winner.
